summary: A newly married woman becomes convinced someone from her past is stalking her, but nobody believes her until the bodies start to pile up.
cast: Lynne Frederick|John Leyton|Stephanie Beacham|John Fraser|Jack Watson|Queenie Watts|Trisha Mortimer|Paul Alexander|Robert Mill|Colin Jeavons|Victor Winding|Raymond Bowers|Pearl Hackney|Terry Duggan|Lindsay Campbell|Diana King|Wendy Gilmore|Primi Townsend|Victoria Allum|John McEnery
keywords: giallo|psychotronic film|grindhouse film|multiple personality disorder|starts with a definition
title: Esquizofrenia
